name: impakter.com
description:
Impakter is a platform dedicated to our future. We were founded in Rome in 2014. From there we established our presence online via our magazine and our first partnerships with UN organisations, NGOs, think tanks, research centers and Universities.

We are trying to make a difference in the world by putting a spotlight on authentic viewpoints and sustainable practices, and bringing to light things that matter today and for our future.

Our Delivery:
We do this via our platform Impakter which delivers online and offline experiences. We have a number of online presence with the Impakter Magazine and offline through the Impakter Forum and book series.

jobs.title: Editorial Internship
jobs.description:
We are a platform dedicated to sustainability. 

WHO WE WORK WITH 
We are a magazine with amazing contributors from writers, scientist, director of companies to head of UN organization, Institutes, NGO and research center

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR 
Editorial Intern

WHAT WILL YOU DO 
You will work closely with the Editorial team on a range of pieces, both reported features, and back-of-the-book reviews and critical essays. 

This is an opportunity to participate in the editorial life of the magazine, and to receive editorial training of the highest level.  

YOUR PROJECT
You will have the opportunity to create your own editorial project during the internship. 

DAY 2 DAY
Work with the Editor in Chief with focus on:
- Content management - Reading and responding to articles as they come in, with thoughts about structure, argument, and ideas.  
- Editing on the level of line and structure.
- Columnist and contributors management
- Editorial work such as interviewing global leaders, articles. 
- Copy writing and Mounting
- Institutional relationship

Important:
- Project management is a possibility as well. You will be handed an organization to follow and work with. Talking to their senior members and communication staff. Planning content release and communication.

WHAT WILL YOU LEARN 
You will learn how to use all the tools and instruments that the tech and social media world require from you: communication, execution, PR, and marketing.

IMPORTANT NOTE: We are looking to hire in the long run. If media and journalism is your thing, then this might well be the opportunity that you are looking for.

jobs.title: Startup Reporter
jobs.description:
We are a platform focused on making sustainability the status quo! How we do it? We inform and boost people.

IMPAKTER MAGAZINE - Inform
We have launched our magazine back in 2014. We have now over 630 organization contributing to it. 

- Aim: quality first.

Just visit: https://impakter.com/

IMPAKTER SOCIAL GOOD COMPANY & INVESTOR PLATFORM - Boost

- We have a platform that helps social good companies/startup to connect with investors.

- You also have events and jobs.

-UN, Institute, NGO post events and jobs as well.

For more: https://up.impakter.com/

******
ROLE
Impakter is looking for an ambitious, fearless and energetic journalist to cover Silicon Valley start-ups, NYC, EU and venture capital scene.

You will be digging into garage style startup all the way to fully funded companies. We will want you to look for the most innovative companies only, those that answer the question: Is it going to change the world?

You should be able to work your way through the hype and concretely indicate the real value of the startup. Understanding it's pros and cons and report on it's an adventure. Never be shy of tackling an interview with the founder (only with him) regardless if he runs a pony or a unicorn.

Applications should include a resume, and a memo outlining the biggest themes on the start-up beat, how those themes should be covered and what types of stories should not be covered.

Can you attend a tech event? You must! We will ask you to apply for a press pass to all of them. 

Will you meet exciting Ceo's? Most definitely!

Where can you do this from? The best locations are: NYC, SF, Boston, London and Paris.

jobs.title: Animation Intern
jobs.description:
We are a platform dedicated to sustainability. 

WHO WE WORK WITH 
We are a magazine with amazing contributors from writers, scientist, director of companies to head of UN organization, Institutes, NGO and research center

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR 
Animation intern

YOUR POSITION

We’re looking for a passionate person, with big love for the environment as much as we do! 

This role will provide the opportunity to conceptualize, design, create and see finished projects in action.

This internship will be working in tandem with the editorial and Social Media and Marking team. 

Aim: create animations that shakes and engage people.

Focus:global issues like plastic pollution, gender equality and sustainable solutions.

TASKS

- Create animations for articles, mobile and web platforms
- Work with the communication and editorial team to create effective campaign 
- Conceptualize and execute animated videos to be used on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Youtube.

WHY
- Potential employment opportunities post-internship
- Gain first hand experience in launching an impact focused business
- Take a deep dive into sustainable world and it's leadership

KEY SKILLS

- Computer Animation or similar major, or extracurricular work in animation
- Ability to communicate complex ideas in a simple way
- Time management and ability to complete a project from start to finish

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1G0fg12Ha-grMiM-uRyRoQ28z1bqBpMT8

jobs.title: Video Editor & Editorial Video Maker - Internship
jobs.description:
We are a platform dedicated to sustainability. 

WHO WE WORK WITH 
We are a magazine with amazing contributors from writers, scientist, director of companies to head of UN organization, Institutes, NGO and research center

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR  
Video Editor

YOUR POSITION

We’re looking for a passionate person, with a big love for the environment as much as we do!

This role will provide the opportunity to be part of our voice.

AIM: 
The aim is not just to edit and mount videos but to become an Editor as well. The role is to become an effective storyteller. You will focus on the following key points (and more):

1. Video news: you will be given a news brief to transform into an informative video. 
2. You Editorial series: you will be able to develop your video series and ideas
3. Impakter campaign: we have a series that aims to inspire people, you will be able to participate from an editorial and creative way to the campaign itself.


WHY 
- Potential employment opportunities post-internship 
- Gain first-hand experience in launching an impact focused business 
- Take a deep dive into a sustainable world and it's leadership

KEY SKILLS

-  Adobe After Effects or similar 
- Ability to communicate complex ideas in a simple way 
- Time management and the ability to complete a project from start to finish
